message.raw:
* Make BLACS connection (the serial number) be an upper-case hex string
* Fix issue where timing out caused acquisition to not wait for enough images
* Do not crash tab if worker has an exception calling snap()

  • Fix issue where timing out caused acquisition to not wait for enough images
  • Do not crash tab if worker has an exception calling snap()
